mapper.select: SELECT r.releaseCode, w.laydownGoodsName, r.releaseGoodsCount, cs.contractorName, r.accepDate, r.releaseDate, r.recipientName, r.shipmentCheckManager, r.shipmentCheckRegDate, r.shipmentCheckResult FROM k3_tb_release AS r INNER JOIN k3_tb_pileup AS p ON r.pileupCode = p.pileupCode INNER JOIN k3_tb_warehousing AS w ON p.warehousingCode = w.warehousingCode INNER JOIN k3_tb_contractor_staff AS cs ON w.contractorId = cs.contractorId WHERE r.releaseAllow = 'Y';
SELECT W.warehousingCode, W.laydownGoodsName, W.laydownGoodsCount FROM k3_tb_warehousing AS W WHERE warehousingCode = "warehousing1"
